job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software.
   Waar kom je te werken?

   T- Mobile, you know who we are. We have already five years in a row the quickest network in the Netherlands. With our challenger mind-set we challenge ourselves and the market to connect everyone with the possibilities of these days. Daring, responsible and working together; those are the key competencies. You can expect the following form us:
     * For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself! We are supporting you with this via our campus; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/?lang=en
     * You are in the lead, so old fashion evaluation and performance interviews are not our way of working. You make sure that your manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests. We call this great conversations, you can find more information via; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/
     * You will get 2000 enthusiastic and driven colleagues;
     * Workshops, sportive events, T-Schnee, drinks and amazing parties organized by Young T-Mobile.

   There is a lot possible within T- Mobile but you have to take initiative yourself. Be enthusiastic, do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!, There are lots of opportunities within T-Mobile, but you have to take the initiative. Be enthusiastic! Is something missing or could something be better? Go ahead, do it differently. After a first digital introduction with a recruiter, you have an interview with the hiring manager. Still enthusiastic? Then there will be a 2nd interview! If you, and we, are even more enthusiastic after that, you will receive an offer and you can join Team Magenta!

   - Besides about 2000 enthusiastic colleagues, we also offer the following:
   - Excellent salary
   - Variable bonus plan
   - Pension plan
   - Personal learning budget
   - Working internationally
   - T-Mobile subscription plan
   - Freedom to work
   - Exchangeable holidays
   Wat ga je bij ons leren?

   What will you learn with us
   For us, learning is just as normal as telephoning. You are responsible for your own development and you decide how, what and when you learn. We support you in this! Go to www.campus.t-mobile.nl for more information.

   How do we do this?
   You are in the lead, so we don't do old-fashioned performance interviews and assessments. You ensure that your manager and your colleagues are aware of your goals and development. We call this Great Conversations, more information can be found at https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/.
   Overige informatie
job_details.full_text:
Linux Engineer | T-Mobile

The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software.
   Waar kom je te werken?

   T- Mobile, you know who we are. We have already five years in a row the quickest network in the Netherlands. With our challenger mind-set we challenge ourselves and the market to connect everyone with the possibilities of these days. Daring, responsible and working together; those are the key competencies. You can expect the following form us:
     * For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself! We are supporting you with this via our campus; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/?lang=en
     * You are in the lead, so old fashion evaluation and performance interviews are not our way of working. You make sure that your manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests. We call this great conversations, you can find more information via; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/
     * You will get 2000 enthusiastic and driven colleagues;
     * Workshops, sportive events, T-Schnee, drinks and amazing parties organized by Young T-Mobile.

   There is a lot possible within T- Mobile but you have to take initiative yourself. Be enthusiastic, do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!, There are lots of opportunities within T-Mobile, but you have to take the initiative. Be enthusiastic! Is something missing or could something be better? Go ahead, do it differently. After a first digital introduction with a recruiter, you have an interview with the hiring manager. Still enthusiastic? Then there will be a 2nd interview! If you, and we, are even more enthusiastic after that, you will receive an offer and you can join Team Magenta!

   - Besides about 2000 enthusiastic colleagues, we also offer the following:
   - Excellent salary
   - Variable bonus plan
   - Pension plan
   - Personal learning budget
   - Working internationally
   - T-Mobile subscription plan
   - Freedom to work
   - Exchangeable holidays
   Wat ga je bij ons leren?

   What will you learn with us
   For us, learning is just as normal as telephoning. You are responsible for your own development and you decide how, what and when you learn. We support you in this! Go to www.campus.t-mobile.nl for more information.

   How do we do this?
   You are in the lead, so we don't do old-fashioned performance interviews and assessments. You ensure that your manager and your colleagues are aware of your goals and development. We call this Great Conversations, more information can be found at https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/.
   Overige informatie

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Linux system administration, infrastructure improvement, automation, and lifecycle management. It does not mention any specific AI, ML, or Generative AI technologies, models, frameworks, or tasks. The core responsibilities and technologies described fall outside the scope of ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles, aligning best with an 'Ambiguous' classification as it's a traditional IT infrastructure role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensuring excellent operations' and 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' aligns with the operational aspects of maintaining systems, which is a component of MLOps, albeit in a broader IT infrastructure context.

The phrase 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' directly relates to the maintenance and management of systems throughout their operational life, a key aspect of operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building and expanding (new) systems and platforms' implies development and integration work, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'enhancing existing infrastructure' suggests modification and improvement of existing systems, which is part of software development and engineering.
The phrase 'automation' suggests the creation of processes and scripts to manage data and systems efficiently, which can be related to data engineering tasks.

you have an interview with the hiring manager
